value.title: Power BI dataflows: One thing you probably missed with your gateway

value.title: Power BI URL Filter Updates (August 2018)

value.title: Slicers vs. Slicer Pane vs. Filter Pane! Which is faster?
value.excerpt: You have different options in Power BI when it comes to slicers and filters. Just put the slicer on the report, use a slicer panel or have them in the filter pane.
